### Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/m3au/purr.git ~/.zsh/purr
echo "source ~/.zsh/purr/purr.zsh" >> ~/.zshrc
source ~/.zshrc
```

Or update if you already have purr installed:

```bash
cd ~/.zsh/purr && git pull
```
